meanings.definition: A slow cooker for cooking food at low temperatures for an extended period of time.
meanings.sent1: My mom uses crockpots to make delicious stews.
meanings.sent2: During the party, the crockpots kept the food warm for hours.
meanings.sent3: The crockpots in the kitchen were working hard all day.
meanings.sent4: The aroma from the crockpots filled the house with warmth.
meanings.sent5: I remember the first time I used crockpots to make a meal; it was so easy!

meanings.definition: To cook food in a crockpot.
meanings.sent1: I crockpot my meals on busy weekdays for convenience.
meanings.sent2: She loves to crockpot chicken for dinner.
meanings.sent3: Let's crockpot something special for the family tonight.
meanings.sent4: He crockpots like a pro, always tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent5: Crockpotting allows you to enjoy a home-cooked meal without much effort.
